Title: The Vietnamese people resist the American aggressor
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: The 21st sheet of a series of 22 (incomplete). The pictorial exhibition includes quotes by Mao Zedong, photographs and cartoons.The text reads "No matter whether the enemy planes come during the day or at night, we must resolutely beat them to pieces."
Theme: Foreign Friends: North VietnamForeign Friends: National Liberation Movements
